body: This unique decorative composition consists of a broken pot of finely painted flowers flowing down outdoor steps. Its color and detail are superb
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 22 x 15 inches / Signed indistinctly and dated lower left
metaDescription: 19th Century Italian or Continental School Oil on Canvas Painting For Sale. Vonsists of a broken pot of finely painted flowers flowing down outdoor steps.

title: 19th Century Italian or Continental School
